nahed.name: Nahed Rachad
nahed.title: Compassionate Guide to
nahed.subtitle: Holistic Wellness
nahed.bio1: Nahed Rachad, founder of RESET CLUB with over 15 years of expertise, has dedicated himself to specializing in personal transformation and health optimization. He has developed a practice rooted in holistic wellness, emphasizing holistic approaches to nutrition and intentional movement.
nahed.bio2: As a certified instructor with over 5000 successful transformations, Nahed integrates his wellness principles into his daily life, demonstrating his commitment to health and well-being. He believes in setting realistic goals with his clients, guiding them towards sustainable long-term behavioral changes.
nahed.bio3: Beyond his professional life, Nahed embraces every moment of his fulfillment. Whether it's traveling, exploring new experiences, or simply savoring simple pleasures, he finds pure joy and happiness.

director.name: Sarah Martinez
director.title: General Director
director.subtitle: Reset Club‚Ñ¢
director.bio1: Sarah Martinez brings over 15 years of experience in managing premium wellness centers across Europe and the Middle East.
director.bio2: A graduate in hospitality management from √âcole H√¥teli√®re de Lausanne and certified in wellness management, she has led several luxury establishments before joining Reset Club‚Ñ¢. Her strategic vision and customer excellence-focused approach have enabled the creation of a unique holistic transformation experience.
director.bio3: Passionate about innovation in the wellness sector, Sarah firmly believes that sustainable transformation requires a global approach combining cutting-edge technology, human expertise, and personalized support.

team.title: Our Expert Team
team.subtitle: A multidisciplinary team of specialists dedicated to your transformation

sarah.name: Dr. Sarah Martinez
sarah.description: Specialist in metabolic optimization and personalized nutrition for lasting results. After completing her masters in nutritional medicine, Dr. Sarah has practiced for over 12 years in renowned hospitals and wellness retreats.

marc.name: Marc Dubois
marc.description: Marc is a dynamic professional with over 10 years of rich multicultural experience encompassing resorts and wellness retreats. He specializes in personalized training programs.

amina.name: Dr. Amina Hassan
amina.description: Dr. Amina has over 8 years of diverse experience in psychological support for life transformations. She specializes in the art of guiding sustainable behavioral changes.

thomas.name: Thomas Laurent
thomas.description: Chef Thomas has over 15 years of experience in wellness culinary arts. He is well-versed in modern European cuisines, with a strong focus on health and prepares simple yet sophisticated dishes.

fatima.name: Dr. Fatima Al-Zahra
fatima.description: Expert in hormonal optimization and anti-aging medicine for longevity. Dr. Fatima specializes in guiding clients towards optimal health through hormonal balance.

alexandre.name: Alexandre Moreau
alexandre.description: Practitioner in alternative therapies and holistic wellness support. Alexandre combines different therapeutic approaches to create personalized healing programs.

Here, you will discover an exclusive method ‚Äì In ‚Ä¢ Out ‚Ä¢ Reset‚Ñ¢ ‚Äì that combines neuroscience, biohacking, and transformational coaching to unlock your blockages, reboot your energy, and reveal your potential.

hero.title: OUR STORY
hero.subtitle: The quest that gave birth to a movement

nahed.name: Nahed Rachad
nahed.title: Founder & Visionary
nahed.subtitle: Reset Club
nahed.bio1: It all started with a personal quest.
nahed.bio2: Nahed Rachad, entrepreneur and coach, experienced what her clients experience: work overload, stress, loss of health and confidence. She searched. She tested. She traveled to the world's biggest shows. She discovered the best technologies, the best approaches in neuroscience, biohacking and transformational coaching.
nahed.bio3: From this quest was born a method, and today, a movement: Reset Club.
